abstract_ssm: The Congregational churches of Brooklyn collection spans the years 1847 to 1961 and measures 0.83 linear feet. Material in the collection includes annual reports, bylaws, church bulletins and newsletters, constitutions, manuals, church histories, programs from church services, anniversary publications, yearbooks, membership rolls, and congregation directories. Church manuals contain a church's articles of faith, covenant, and often a list of members and addresses; member names and addresses can also be found in church yearbooks, member rolls, and directories in the collection.
